positions.description_html:
• Spearhead NRI Banking Business for Gujarat covering 57 Branches.
• Growing the NRI Banking business profitability both on liability & revenue side for entire Zone, while managing risk in order to meet targets.
• Manage, coach & develop staff within the entire team ensuring the accomplishment of the target set for the team.
• Formulating Business Plan(s) together with necessary product(s) development and policies and procedure for the NRI Business.
• Maximize cross selling opportunities and success rate through full liaison with all product specialist.
• Accountable for Training, Activation, Cost Budgeting of Various Promotional Activities, Planning and Implementing Marketing Strategies for the potential branches across various channels of the Bank.
• Ensuring achievement of benchmark productivity for the NR Relationship Managers on client acquisition, balance sheet growth & revenue delivery.
• Conduct critical reviews, assessments, timely identification of problems for overall business development and executing/supervising implementation of appropriate operational controls to safeguard bank’s interests.
